items.title: CVE-2026-26198
items.key_takeaway: Ormar versions 0.9.9‑0.22.0 allow raw SQL injection via min()/max() aggregate calls, letting attackers read the entire database; upgrade to version 0.23.0 or later immediately.

items.title: CVE-2026-26331
items.key_takeaway: yt-dlp versions prior to 2026.02.21 allow command injection via the --netrc-cmd option; upgrade to 2026.02.21 or later, or avoid using that option.

items.title: CVE-2026-27952
items.key_takeaway: Agenta API versions prior to 0.48.1 allow sandbox escape via a whitelisted numpy package, enabling arbitrary code execution on the server; upgrade to ≥0.48.1 (or use v0.60+ where the sandbox was removed) immediately.

items.title: CVE-2025-69985
items.key_takeaway: FUXA versions <=1.2.8 trust the HTTP Referer header for JWT validation, allowing unauthenticated authentication bypass and remote code execution via the /api/runscript endpoint; upgrade to a patched version or remove the Referer check immediately.

items.title: CVE-2026-27699
items.key_takeaway: basic-ftp versions before 5.2.0 allow path traversal via malicious FTP server filenames in downloadToDir(); upgrade to >=5.2.0 to prevent arbitrary file writes.

items.title: CVE-2026-27903
items.key_takeaway: Upgrade minimatch to versions >=10.2.3 (or the equivalent patched versions) to prevent unbounded recursive backtracking that can be exploited to stall the Node.js event loop when attacker-controlled glob patterns contain multiple '**' segments.

items.title: CVE-2026-27959
items.key_takeaway: Upgrade Koa to versions >=3.1.2 (or >=2.16.4) to fix naive Host header parsing in ctx.hostname, preventing host header injection attacks that can manipulate URL generation and routing.

items.title: CVE-2026-27208
items.key_takeaway: Upgrade bleon-ethical/api-gateway-deploy to version 1.0.1 (or later) to mitigate critical OS command injection and privilege escalation vulnerabilities that allow root command execution and potential container escape.

items.title: CVE-2026-27899
items.key_takeaway: Upgrade WireGuard Portal to version 2.1.3 or later to prevent authenticated non-admin users from escalating to full admin privileges via the IsAdmin field in profile updates.

items.title: CVE-2026-2794
items.key_takeaway: Update Firefox and Firefox Focus for Android to version 148 or later to fix an information disclosure bug caused by uninitialized memory.

items.title: CVE-2026-2800
items.key_takeaway: Upgrade Firefox for Android and Thunderbird to version 148 or later to mitigate a critical WebAuthn spoofing vulnerability.

items.title: CVE-2026-2634
items.key_takeaway: Update Firefox for iOS to version 147.4 or later to mitigate a critical address-bar spoofing vulnerability that could present attacker-controlled pages under spoofed domains.

items.title: OWASP Mobile Application Security Testing Guide (MASTG)
items.key_takeaway: The updated OWASP MASTG offers a comprehensive, current methodology and test cases for mobile app security testing on iOS and Android, essential for hardening and validating mobile applications.

items.title: OWASP Mobile Application Security Verification Standard (MASVS)
items.key_takeaway: MASVS defines a comprehensive set of security requirements for mobile apps, serving as a verification benchmark for design, data storage, cryptography, authentication, networking, platform interaction, code quality, and resilience.

items.title: OWASP Top 10 for Web Applications
items.key_takeaway: The OWASP Top 10 provides essential awareness of the most critical web application security risks, serving as a baseline for secure design, testing, and remediation in our web projects.
